title: Why is Neil Young not better known? - Quora

response.answer_text: Why are the Beatles not better known? Why is Michael Jackson not better known? Neil Young is well known, believe me. Not as well known as the other two examples I have cited, but very well known nonetheless. To some degree, Neil is an acquired taste. I personally like his music immensely, but also realize that it is not for everyone.

Neil Young is one of the best-known artists in the world. Getting him to be better known would entail shouting his name in the face of newborns, not sure what purpose this would server though. I’m sure Neil feels he is famous enough.
